content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: VISIT
      operator: non_empty
    - name: SVPRESP
      operator: equal_to
      value: Y
    - name: VISIT
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value: $tv_visit
Match Datasets:
  - Name: SV
    Keys:
      - USUBJID
      - VISIT

Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0031_sfqc
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Verify that a domain visit value is planned by existing in TV.VISIT
Operations:
  - domain: TV
    id: $tv_visit
    name: VISIT
    operator: distinct
Outcome:
  Message: Visit Value cannot be found in Trial Visit (TV) domain
  Output Variables:
    - VISIT
    - VISITNUM

Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Value
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0031
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: For planned visits, values of VISIT, VISITNUM, and
                  VISITDY must be those  defined in the Trial Visits (TV) dataset
                  (Section 7.3.1, Trial Visits).
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: ''
                Section: 4.4.5
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - TV

json.Description: Verify that a domain visit value is planned by existing in TV.VISIT

Outcome.Message: Visit Value cannot be found in Trial Visit (TV) domain

Citations.Cited_Guidance: For planned visits, values of VISIT, VISITNUM, and VISITDY must be those  defined in the Trial Visits (TV) dataset (Section 7.3.1, Trial Visits).
